about_the_game:
Dare to enter the profound darkness of the haunted mansion in "BlindDead," an innovative horror game where your senses will be tested like never before.

Take on the role of a blind person, awakening trapped in a sinister labyrinth of a mansion filled with malevolent plush dolls that hunt you relentlessly. In absolute darkness, your eyes cannot help you, but your voice becomes the light that guides you.

Use a microphone to produce sounds that reveal your surroundings. With each whisper or scream, sound waves will outline the world around you, in a captivating and tense experience. Be cautious, as every noise attracts the attention of those hunting you, and death lurks in every dark corner of the mansion.

Escape your life from this hell of malevolent dolls and unveil the mystery haunting these terrifying creations. Confront your fears and explore the darkness within the depths of your soul in "BlindDead."



*Key Features:*
- Innovative and captivating first-person horror experience.
- Puts you in the shoes of a blind person, using sound to navigate and survive.
- Terrifying atmosphere, with malevolent plush dolls and a haunted mansion.
- Solve the mystery behind the dolls and the darkness threatening your life.
- An original soundtrack that enhances the suspense and terror of every moment.

Get ready to plunge into the absolute darkness of "BlindDead" and discover what lies beyond the boundaries of the visible world.

content_descriptors.notes: This video game contains scenes of murder, blood, gore, loud noises, loud screaming, scary monsters and creatures, mutilation, and jumpscares.
